data.meanings: paid, discharged, gave against will, taking upon oneself that which is not obligatory upon him; damage or loss that befalls a man in his property; lasting evil, perdition; shacked or burdened or captived
data.sentence: The word لَمُغْرَمُونَ comes from the root غ ر م and is associated with the meanings: paid, discharged, gave against will, taking upon oneself that which is not obligatory upon him; damage or loss that befalls a man in his property; lasting evil, perdition; shacked or burdened or captived
